text: Xerolycosa is a small genus of wolf spiders in the family Lycosidae, subfamily Evippinae, consisting of three species which have a Palearctic distribution and one with an Afro-tropical distribution. ==Species== , the World Spider Catalog accepted the following species: *Xerolycosa miniata (C.L. Koch, 1834) – Palearctic *Xerolycosa mongolica (Schenkel, 1963) – Russia, China *Xerolycosa nemoralis (Westring, 1861) – Palearctic *Xerolycosa sansibarina Roewer, 1960 – Zanzibar ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Lycosidae Category:Palearctic spiders Category:Taxa named by Friedrich Dahl
title: Xerolycosa
